bibl.title: Homer und Hephaistos in einem Berliner Papyrus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Fragment of a prose text (probably by an author of the Second Sophistic) which quotes Iliad 18.483 and 485. Hermoupolis, later 2nd century AD.

bibl.title: Festschrift für Günter Poethke zum 70. Geburtstag (P. Poethke)

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Berol. Inv. 21116 verso = P. Poethke 24
MAEHLER Herwig, Homer und Hephaistos in einem Berliner Papyrus. Avec résumé en anglais.
Festschrift für Günter Poethke zum 70. Geburtstag (P. Poethke) = ArchPF 55 (2009) pp. 357-363, No. 24 et pl. XIII.
Fragment of a prose text (probably by an author of the Second Sophistic) which quotes Iliad 18.483 and 485. Hermoupolis, later 2nd century AD.
